Are you a newly admitted AHS student? You’re in the right place! Here you’ll find information and resources to help you identify and take your next steps as an AHS student.            UIC Admissions next steps       The Nexus       Activate your NetID       Get social       Live chat support               We envision a world in which every person can live a healthy and self-determined life. Do you?      New student resources        Placement testing   Complete placement testing         UIC Orientation   Sign up for the summer 2020 virtual orientation         UIC Office of the Registrar   Register for courses         UIC Campus Housing   Learn about campus housing           Graduate and professional students   Newly admitted graduate and professional students should consult their respective AHS program to obtain information on new student orientation and prematriculation requirements.      Undergraduate students   Participation in the New Student Orientation is required for all new AHS undergraduate students. AHS undergraduate students may also be required to participate in campus and program-specific orientation events.  New undergraduate students will have an opportunity to meet with an academic advisor during the New Student Orientation. Academic advisors are unable to meet with students who have not participated in the New Student Orientation. Please direct any questions about orientation to ahsinfo@uic.edu.  Transfer students are expected to meet with their academic advisor during orientation. Readmitted students are not required to attend orientation but should make an appointment with an academic advisor as soon as possible prior to the start of the semester.  UPCOMING EVENTS  There are several opportunities to learn more about our programs and connect with our faculty, advisors and students prior to enrolling.  Consider attending one of the following events to learn more.   April 16 at noon: Information session for newly admitted AHS undergraduate students  April 22 at 6 p.m.: Spark your Future with AHS  April 28 at 2 p.m.: Information session for newly admitted AHS undergraduate students  TBD: Nutrition information session  TBD: Kinesiology information session  TBD:Rehabilitation Sciences information session               AHS Live Chat available Monday – Friday, 9am – 4pm    We are happy to answer any questions you have     Email  ahsinfo@uic.edu      Phone  (312) 996-2079      Address  1919 W.
